titles.title: Providing for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 4872) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to Title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2010 (S.Con.Res. 13).

action.text: The House Committee on Rules reported an original measure, H. Rept. 111-458, by Ms. Slaughter.

The resolution makes in order a motion offered by the chair of the Committee on Education and Labor that the House concur in the Senate amendments to H.R. 4872. The previous question shall be considered as ordered without intervening motion or demand for division of the question. The resolution provides 10 minutes of debate on the motion. The resolution waives all points of order against consideration of the motion except those arising under clause 10 of rule XXI.

calendar.text: Placed on the House Calendar, Calendar No. 182.

action.text: DEBATE - The House proceeded with one hour of debate on H. Res. 1225.
The previous question was ordered without objection.

vote.text: On agreeing to the resolution Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 225 - 199 (Roll no. 193).

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.

bill.summary: 3/25/2010--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for consideration of the Senate amendments to the bill (H.R. 4872) to provide for reconciliation pursuant to Title II of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2010 (S.Con.Res. 13).
